SENT.plain: The computed tomographic findings in 15 patients with angiographically documented cerebral arterial ectasia are reported
In addition to demonstrating the majority of pathologic arterial segments, computed tomography also documents the presence and extent of associated intracranial abnormalities
In this study these included cerebral atrophy (10 patients), infarction (three patients), and subarachnoid hemorrhage (one patient)
